name: Hexsweeper (ZjamberEaber)
description:
I made this game when I was 17.  Back in sixth form, me and my friends used to play some Minesweeper, and also some Hex against eachother. One day I thought "These games are quite different, wouldn't it be dumb if I combined them!" and I then proceeded to combine them and that is what this pygame is. I don't think I did too bad of a job. This game is meant to be played with one other person on the same device.

If you are familiar with the rules of Minesweeper and Hex then you should be mostly fine, however there is an instruction text file included with the game if you want to read it.
